# Tote Inventory Management App

A complete React-based application for managing storage totes and their contents with photo support.

## Project Overview
This application helps organize items stored in totes across 26 shelf positions (A1-G5). Users can create totes, assign them to specific shelf locations, add items with photos, and search through their inventory.

## Key Features
- ✅ Tote creation and management with custom names
- ✅ 26 predefined shelf positions (A1-A5, B1-B5, C4-C5, D4-D5, E4-E5, F1-F5, G1-G5)
- ✅ Item management with photo upload capability
- ✅ Search functionality across totes, positions, and items
- ✅ Edit and delete operations for totes and items
- ✅ Local storage persistence
- ✅ Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- ✅ Modern React 18 with Vite build system

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with JSX
- Vite for development and building
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Lucide React for icons
- Browser localStorage for data persistence

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server (http://localhost:3000)
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Project Status
✅ Complete and ready to use! The application is fully functional with all requested features implemented.
